config_files.abixen-platform-web-content-service/src/:
FROM openjdk:8-jre
VOLUME /tmp
ADD abixen-platform-web-content-service.jar app.jar

ENTRYPOINT ["java","-Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/./urandom","-Dspring.profiles.active=docker","-Dabixen.services.eureka.uri=discovery"]
CMD ["-jar","/app.jar"]

static_files.abixen-platform-web-content-service/src/:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-3.5.xsd"
        logicalFilePath="liquibase/changelog/structure/structure-changelog.xml">

    <changeSet id="structure-sequence-v1" author="AdamTurski">
        <createSequence sequenceName="structure_seq" startValue="2"/>
    </changeSet>

    <changeSet id="structure-v1" author="AdamTurski">
        <createTable tableName="structure">
            <column name="id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="name" type="varchar(255)">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="content" type="longvarchar"/>
            <column name="template_id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="created_by_id" type="bigint"/>
            <column name="created_date" type="timestamp"/>
            <column name="last_modified_by_id" type="bigint"/>
            <column name="last_modified_date" type="timestamp"/>
        </createTable>

        <addPrimaryKey columnNames="id" constraintName="pk__structure__id" tableName="structure"/>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="template_id" baseTableName="structure"
                                 constraintName="fk__template_id__structure__template"
                                 deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="template"/>

    </changeSet>

</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-3.5.xsd"
        logicalFilePath="liquibase/changelog/template/template-changelog.xml">

    <changeSet id="template-sequence-v1" author="AdamTurski">
        <createSequence sequenceName="template_seq" startValue="2"/>
    </changeSet>

    <changeSet id="template-v1" author="AdamTurski">
        <createTable tableName="template">
            <column name="id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="name" type="varchar(255)">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="content" type="longvarchar"/>
            <column name="created_by_id" type="bigint"/>
            <column name="created_date" type="timestamp"/>
            <column name="last_modified_by_id" type="bigint"/>
            <column name="last_modified_date" type="timestamp"/>
        </createTable>

        <addPrimaryKey columnNames="id" constraintName="pk__template__id" tableName="template"/>

    </changeSet>

</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-3.5.xsd"
        logicalFilePath="liquibase/changelog/web-content-changelog.xml">

    <changeSet id="web-content-sequence-v1" author="AdamTurski">
        <createSequence sequenceName="web_content_seq" startValue="3"/>
    </changeSet>

    <changeSet id="web-content-v1" author="AdamTurski">
        <createTable tableName="web_content">
            <column name="id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="type" type="varchar(255)">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="title" type="varchar(255)">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="content" type="longvarchar">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="created_by_id" type="bigint"/>
            <column name="created_date" type="timestamp"/>
            <column name="last_modified_by_id" type="bigint"/>
            <column name="last_modified_date" type="timestamp"/>
        </createTable>

        <addPrimaryKey columnNames="id" constraintName="pk__web_content__id" tableName="web_content"/>
    </changeSet>

    <changeSet id="simple-web-content-v1" author="AdamTurski">
        <createTable tableName="simple_web_content">
            <column name="id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
        </createTable>

        <addPrimaryKey columnNames="id" constraintName="pk__simple_web_content__id" tableName="simple_web_content"/>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="id" baseTableName="simple_web_content"
                                 constraintName="fk__simple_web_content__id" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="web_content"/>
    </changeSet>

    <changeSet id="advanced-web-content-v1" author="AdamTurski">
        <createTable tableName="advanced_web_content">
            <column name="id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="structure_id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
        </createTable>

        <addPrimaryKey columnNames="id" constraintName="pk__advanced_web_content__id" tableName="advanced_web_content"/>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="id" baseTableName="advanced_web_content"
                                 constraintName="fk__advanced_web_content__id" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="web_content"/>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="structure_id" baseTableName="advanced_web_content"
                                 constraintName="fk__structure_id__advanced_web_content__structure"
                                 deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="structure"/>
    </changeSet>

</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-3.5.xsd"
        logicalFilePath="liquibase/changelog/web-content-changelog.xml">

    <changeSet id="web-content-module-config-sequence-v1" author="KonradWisniewski">
        <createSequence sequenceName="web_content_module_config_seq" startValue="2"/>
    </changeSet>

    <changeSet id="web-content-module-config-v1" author="KonradWisniewski">
        <createTable tableName="web_content_module_config">
            <column name="id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="module_id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="content_id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="created_by_id" type="bigint"/>
            <column name="created_date" type="timestamp"/>
            <column name="last_modified_by_id" type="bigint"/>
            <column name="last_modified_date" type="timestamp"/>
        </createTable>

        <addPrimaryKey columnNames="id" constraintName="pk__web_content_module_config__id" tableName="web_content_module_config"/>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="content_id" baseTableName="web_content_module_config"
                                 constraintName="fk__web_content__web_content_module_config__id" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="web_content"/>
    </changeSet>

</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-3.5.xsd"
        logicalFilePath="liquibase/import/import.xml">
    <changeSet author="KonradWisniewski" id="import-v1" runAlways="false" runOnChange="true">

        <preConditions onFail="HALT">
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM template</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM structure</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM web_content</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM simple_web_content</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM advanced_web_content</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM web_content_module_config</sqlCheck>
        </preConditions>
        <loadData file="liquibase/import/data/template-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="template">
        </loadData>
        <loadData file="liquibase/import/data/structure-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="structure">
        </loadData>
        <loadData file="liquibase/import/data/web-content-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="web_content">
        </loadData>
        <loadData file="liquibase/import/data/simple-web-content-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="simple_web_content">
        </loadData>
        <loadData file="liquibase/import/data/advanced-web-content-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="advanced_web_content">
        </loadData>
        <loadData file="liquibase/import/data/web-content-config-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="web_content_module_config">
        </loadData>
    </changeSet>

</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Configuration status="info" name="XMLConfigTest" packages="org.apache.logging.log4j.test">
    <Properties>
        <Property name="pattern">%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss SSS} [%p] [c=%c{1}] %m%n</Property>
        <Property name="logsPath">logs</Property>
    </Properties>

    <Appenders>
        <Console name="STDOUT">
            <PatternLayout>
                <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>
            </PatternLayout>
        </Console>
        <RollingFile name="webContentServiceAppLog" fileName="${logsPath}/abixen-platform-web-content-service-app.log"
                     filePattern="${logsPath}/$${date:yyyy-MM}/abixen-platform-web-content-service-app-%d{MM-dd-yyyy}-%i.log.gz">
            <PatternLayout>
            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>
        </PatternLayout>
            <policies>
                <SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy size="10 MB" />
            </policies>
            <DefaultRolloverStrategy max="10"/>
        </RollingFile>

        <RollingFile name="webContentServiceRootLog" fileName="${logsPath}/abixen-platform-web-content-service-root.log"
                     filePattern="${logsPath}/$${date:yyyy-MM}/abixen-platform-web-content-service-root-%d{MM-dd-yyyy}-%i.log.gz">
            <PatternLayout>
                <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>
            </PatternLayout>
            <policies>
                <SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy size="10 MB" />
            </policies>
            <DefaultRolloverStrategy max="10"/>
        </RollingFile>
</Appenders>
    <Loggers>
        <Logger name="com.abixen.platform.client.web" level="debug" additivity="false">
            <AppenderRef ref="STDOUT"/>
            <AppenderRef ref="webContentServiceAppLog">
            </AppenderRef>
        </Logger>

        <Logger name="org.springframework" level="warn" additivity="false">
            <AppenderRef ref="webContentServiceAppLog">
            </AppenderRef>
            <AppenderRef ref="STDOUT" level="warn"/>
        </Logger>

        <Root level="info">
            <AppenderRef ref="STDOUT"/>
            <AppenderRef ref="webContentServiceRootLog">
            </AppenderRef>
        </Root>
    </Loggers>
</Configuration>
